parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To talk with, live with. From sun and homileo; to converse mutually.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
